text: The Killer Inside Me is a 2010 American crime drama thriller movie based on the 1952 novel of the same name.IFC gets 'Killer' instinct at Sundance - Controversial Winterbottom film finds U.S. home from Variety It is set in Texas in 1952. It stars Jessica Alba and Casey Affleck. ==Related pages== *The Top 100 Crime Novels of All Time ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2010 crime drama movies Category:2010 crime thriller movies Category:2010 drama thriller movies Category:2010s American crime drama movies Category:2010s American crime thriller movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:BDSM in movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies set in the 1950s
title: The Killer Inside Me (2010 movie)
